name.en: Evasive Chaos Ninjutsu Art of Goshinichu
name.ja: <ruby>昆<rt>こん</rt></ruby><ruby>遁<rt>とん</rt></ruby><ruby>忍<rt>にん</rt></ruby><ruby>法<rt>ぽう</rt></ruby>－<ruby>五<rt>ご</rt></ruby><ruby>翅<rt>し</rt></ruby><ruby>二<rt>に</rt></ruby><ruby>虫<rt>ちゅう</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: Send 1 Insect Type monster from your hand to the Graveyard.

effect.en: Excavate the top 5 cards of your Deck. You can add up to 2 excavated DARK Attribute Insect Type monsters with 400 DEF to your hand. Place the other cards on the bottom of your Deck in any order.
